verses.text: And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Is there \w yet|strong="H3426"\w* any that is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, that I may \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* him \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* for \w Jonathan’s|strong="H3083"\w* sake?

And \add there was\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*. And when they had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \add is he\add*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* there \w not|strong="H0657"\w* yet \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, that I may \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* the \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* unto him? And \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* hath yet a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add which is\add* \w lame|strong="H5223"\w* on \add his\add* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Where|strong="H0375"\w* \add is\add* he? And \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Behold, he \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w*, in \w Lo-debar|strong="H3810"\w*.

¶ Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* him out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w*, from \w Lo-debar|strong="H3810"\w*.

Now when \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and did \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*!\f + \fr 9.6 \ft Mephibosheth: also called Merib-baal\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for I will \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* for \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* sake, and will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* thee all the \w land|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* at my \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

And he \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, that thou shouldest \w look|strong="H6437"\w* upon such a \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* as I \add am\add*?

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*, \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* all that \w pertained|strong="H1961"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and to all his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Thou therefore, and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, shall \w till|strong="H5647"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* for him, and thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in \add the fruits\add*, that thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* may have \w food|strong="H3899"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: but \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w alway|strong="H8548"\w* at my \w table|strong="H7979"\w*. Now \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* had \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, According to all that my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, so shall thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. As for \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*, \add said the king\add*, he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* at my \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* had a \w young|strong="H6996"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Micha|strong="H4316"\w*. And all that \w dwelt|strong="H4186"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \add were\add* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* unto \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*.

So \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* at the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*; and was \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* on \w both|strong="H8147"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.
